3/26/11
started project

might have done jdom right

- get jdom-1.1.1.tar.gz from http://www.jdom.org/dist/binary/
- unzip & untar (double-click in Finder)
- terminal: JAVA_HOME=/Library/Java/Home; export JAVA_HOME
- in /jdom ./build.sh
- using Finder, option-drag jdom/build/jdom.jar to KeyMaker/
- refresh
- add jar 
- commit
- in build.xml, use "<zipfileset src="jdom.jar"/>"
seems ok..

4/6/11
want to encrypt the grader.key files a little better
use rsa

experiment with keys

make a special class MakeRSAPair to make them ready for including in code

can paste output strings into code for BigInteger modulus = new BigInteger("...");

remember - use them backwards
usually
	public key used for encryption
	private for decryption
for the grader.key
	"public key" used for encryption but not made public
		hard-coded into KeyMaker
	"private key" used for decryption and made public
		as part of VGLII
	but nobody can use the info in VGLII to make their own key

here they are:
public key: (use for encryption in KeyMaker but don't share with anyone)
Public 
modulus=16535041048499767432280561548914090132532360939797785653288387973154270743694039754
30974562841788165970594766360963770693849792311050190156038613287444474793034804130176478093934647
77541944418890181769933742095101231996651211558805528939751451986191172867358166505243645505175019
70258597915704430152581511002755971238253382689824280922863068132348545948809243162538196811533138
29664131868324607010219826904624980535355450555970393929721222136460677652188567894719541253019812
71045591204934226132884600554708976227930019994163446120250393619130412293331767837353979418447362
17517587993421956670040489473092419556704483 
exponent=65537

Private key: (use for decryption in VGLII)
Private 
modulus=1653504104849976743228056154891409013253236093979778565328838797315427074369403975

97025859791570443015258151100275597123825338268982428092286306813234854594880924316253819681153313

4/7/11
this failed
made folder in src/keys and saved public and private keys

got it working with .key files in jar

4/16/11
set up to make
	student.key a 'public.key' for encrypting problems for grading
		(save for grading)
	instructor.key a 'private.key' for reading these for grading
also since anyone could just make an rsa key pair of their own
add a secret OFFSET integer to the modulus of student.key and instructor.key
(need to subtract in VGL)
